## SynQLite.run() method

Run an operation against the DB

**Signature:**

```typescript
run<T>(params: QueryParams): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [QueryParams](./synqlite-node.queryparams.md) | The SQL query and optionally any values. |

**Returns:**

T


## Remarks

This method does not return any records, only the result of the operation.
